resource_data:

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/990</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/990</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Literatura: disfrutar y vivir</string>
            <string language="en">Literature: enjoying life</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur: Genießen des Lebens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Littérature : apprécier la vie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Literatura: apreciando a vida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Letteratura: godere vita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογοτεχνία: απόλαυση της ζωής</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs interactiu que tracta el tòpic de la poesia "carpe diem".  S'analitza la concepció de la vida medieval, del Renaixement i del Barroc. Mètrica: estrofes de dos, tres i quatre versos. Lectures de poemes de Garcilaso, Góngora, Quevedo i Francisco Brines. Activitats d'autoavaluació per a la pràctica dels continguts de la unitat.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive resource on the subject of "carpe diem" in poetry. It analyses the Medieval, Renaissance and Baroque views of life. Metre: verses of two, three and four lines. Fragments from poems by Garcilaso, Góngora, Quevedo and Francisco Brines. Self-assessment activities are also included for practice.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">obra literària</string>
            <string language="en">literary work</string>
            <string language="es">obra literaria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">poema</string>
            <string language="en">poem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió del text</string>
            <string language="en">text comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión del texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives Hilfsmittel bezüglich "des carpe 
diem" in der Poesie. Sie analysiert das mittelalterliche, die 
Renaissance und die barocken Lebensanschauungen. Meßinstrument:
Verse von zwei, drei und vier Zeilen. Fragmente 
von den Gedichten durch Garcilaso, Góngora, Quevedo und Francisco 
Salzlösungen. Selbstbewertung Aktivitäten sind auch für 
Praxis eingeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource interactive au sujet de "diem de carpe" 
dans la poésie. Elle analyse le médiéval, la Renaissance et 
les vues de la vie baroques. Mètre : vers de deux, trois 
et quatre lignes. Fragments des poésies par des saumures de 
Garcilaso, de Góngora, de Quevedo et de Francisco. Des 
activités de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment sont également incluses pour la 
pratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso interativo no assunto do "do diem carpe" na
poesia. Analisa o medieval, o renascimento e as vistas de vida 
baroque. Medidor: versos de duas, três e quatro linhas. 
Fragmentos dos poemas por salmouras de Garcilaso, de Góngora, 
de Quevedo e de Francisco. As atividades do self-assessment são
incluídas também para a prática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa interattiva a proposito "del diem del 
carpe" nella poesia. Analizza il medioevale, la rinascita e le 
viste di vita baroque. Tester: i verses di due, tre e 
quattro righe. Frammenti dai poems dalle salamoie del Garcilaso,
di Góngora, di Quevedo e di Francisco. Le attività di 
valutazione di se stesso egualmente sono incluse per pratica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς σχετικά με το θέμα 
"του carpe diem" στην ποίηση. Αναλύει το μεσαιωνικό, 
την αναγέννηση και μπαρόκ τις όψεις της ζωής. Μέτρο: 
στίχοι δύο, τριών και τεσσάρων γραμμών. Τεμάχια από
τα ποιήματα από Garcilaso, Gσngora, Quevedo και 
Francisco Brines. Οι δραστηριότητες αυτοαξιολόγησης 
συμπεριλαμβάνονται επίσης για την πρακτική.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literarische Arbeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gedicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Textverständnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">travail littéraire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poésie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension des textes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">trabalho literário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">poema</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão de texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lavoro letterario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">poem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione del testo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογοτεχνικό έργο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ποίημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση κειμένων</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
